thesis.description: The exact physiological significance of the frequent occurrence of adrenaline and noradrenaline in varying ratios in different body tissues is still unknown. The earliest pharmacological distinction between the actions of the two agents, was based upon the well-known observation that after a previous injection of the ergot alkaloids, the pressor response to adrenaline is usually inverted, while that to noradrenaline although diminished is not reversed. [...]
thesis.creator: Mazurkiewicz, Irena M.
thesis.subject: Pharmacology.
thesis.title: Studies of Changes in the Urinary Excretion of Adrenaline and Noradrenaline with some Observations on their Possible Pharmacological Significance.
